content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Iron ore mine at position(x=43.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-83.0)
-  Burner mining drill (position x=-15.0, y=-50.0) and a chest at position(x=-16.5, y=-49.5)
### Copper plate factory
No structures found
### Electricity generator at position(x=10.5, y=10.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=10.5, y=10.5), boiler(position x=-6.0, y=24.5) and offshore pump (position x=-9.5, y=24.5)
### Lab at position(x=2.5, y=0.5)
Consists of lab(position x=2.5, y=0.5) and burner inserter(position x=3.5, y=0.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when inserting items into labs
-  Ensure you have the required science pack in your inventory before attempting to insert it into a lab
### Errors when researching technologies
-  Ensure you have the required science pack in your inventory and the lab is set up correctly before attempting to research a technology
### Errors when connecting entities
-  Ensure the entities are close enough and there are no obstacles before attempting to connect them
### Errors when using prototypes
-  Ensure the prototype exists and is spelled correctly before attempting to use it
### Errors when extracting items
-  Ensure the entity has the item you are trying to extract before attempting to extract it
### Errors when placing items into a tile
-  Ensure the tile is empty before attempting to place an item into it
### Errors when setting up fluid systems
-  Ensure the fluid system is set up correctly and there are no leaks before attempting to use it
### Errors when using burner mining drills
-  Ensure the burner mining drill has fuel before attempting to use it
### Errors when using furnaces
-  Ensure the furnace has the required ingredients and fuel before attempting to use it
### Errors when using boilers
-  Ensure the boiler has fuel and is connected to a steam engine before attempting to use it
### Errors when using offshore pumps
-  Ensure the offshore pump has a connection to a fluid system before attempting to use it
### Errors when using steam engines
-  Ensure the steam engine is connected to a boiler and has a fluid system before attempting to use it
